Articles.Content: So, i want to fly a craft with mk3 cockpit. No, i dont want to change the cockpit.rasterpropmonitor is already in my game. Thanks in advance

I think people tend to stay away from it. There is a general consensus that the thing is hideous so nobody wants to make anything for it. But you can find mods with cockpits that try to mimic STS/Buran orbiters like the Mk3 does and look a lot better. Kerbal Shuttle Orbiter System, Component Space Shuttle, and B9 all have offerings that have the look. CSS is probably the most real looking to the Buran and STS shuttles.

Edited July 13, 2014 by Alshain
Touhou Torpedo had a Mk3 cockpit improvement pack, but he took all his packs offline. If you have it squirreled away somewhere though, do install it.

So, i want to fly a craft with mk3 cockpit. No, i dont want to change the cockpit.rasterpropmonitor is already in my game. Thanks in advance

Forgive the question, but what are you actually asking? You want a mod for the cockpit, but don't want to change the cockpit? I'm confused.
The shuttles in my Tiberdyne Shuttle System mod are Mk3-based, but I made them bigger because a Mk3-sized shuttle wasn't big enough to haul much cargo.
